preqs: Must have passed all units in OHS1000 and IAR3115 and  IAR2204

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 3 (I/W) units in {IAR2204, IAR3115, OHS1000}

description: This unit integrates the work undertaken in IAR1211 and IAR2204 and uses example studies to develop understanding and demonstrate competence in detailing and specifying construction and materials for a range of common interior construction contexts. This unit includes a number of set projects which require students to detail and specify construction and material to a professional standard, sufficient for construction and briefing of the specialists. Site visits relevant to the projects are undertaken.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
